website_summaries.verdict: Comfort and high quality sound in a small package.
pros: These earphones are all about variety
Multiple color options, and multiple ear cushion sizes complement the broad sound quality
cons: Some complained that they didn't come with a case, considering the price

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the case?
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression that they came with the case that is also pictured with the item. Is that not true?
customer_reviews.author: Colleen S.

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound in these is amazing, what an upgrade switching to these! The color is nice and matte. The packaging is very appealing as it closely resembles Apple’s packaging. I had no problem with the lighting connection. I just noticed the backs of the buds are magnetic as well! Would like to purchase one of every color!
customer_reviews.author: We Speak Fireworks

customer_reviews.title: Avoid Matte Gold Color
customer_reviews.text: The sound is pretty good, though a bit bass heavy (expected that with Beats). I like that the headphones snap together through magnets and that the cords are flat; altogether this makes them unlikely to really tangle. I also appreciate that the volume control as it gives me a great indicator for which bud is left. I'm happy with them, but that matte gold color looks pretty awful in person. "White person who smokes a lot skin color" is a more apt name. Get a different color.
customer_reviews.author: J. F. Rick

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the case?
customer_reviews.text: Ok earbuds. However, I did not receive the case that was shown with them.
customer_reviews.author: JLG

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nearly perfect. As another reviewer noted, they are a great fit and provide stellar sound isolation without being noise canceling. The cables are flat and light while the earbuds are magnetic for storage. I’ve not experienced any tangling and there is slight cable noise (the sound that travels up the cable to the earpiece when brushed against). They would be absolutely perfect if they had a charging port like what is found on the Pioneer Rayz Plus which allows you to charge and listen to music simultaneously on an iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: m-dub

customer_reviews.title: Updated review after 4 months. VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Beats my entire life and I am just so disappointed. I’ve been using these for 4 months and the right earphone already stopped working. It came to my attention that the cable had some wrinkle(?) -see picture- when I first bought them but I didn’t put a lot of mind to it since they worked well. Bad choice, right earphone suddenly stopped working. I’m attaching pictures of my 3.5 mm cable (I use those for my tablet) so you guys can see the difference, please avoid this product or at least the lightning cable ones (for iPhone). Might try Bosé after this... Dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: Tried 3 other top rated earbuds, these are far and away the best
customer_reviews.text: There is something about my ears that apple earbuds and the other types with a larger outer shape really hurt me. These fit perfectly out of the box, and the sound quality is amazing. There is bass. They fit so well that I can't hear a TV on at normal volume. Amazing bass. I also love that there is a lightning adapter to go straight into my phone, so I am not worried about the apple adapter eventually breaking. A+, you won't regret it, give these a try. Great value for $$.
customer_reviews.author: SGV Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Sounds amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is they push them selves out of my ear and I have to keep pushing it back in, but after a few times and adjusting it the way I want I can get it to stay. Sounds great, works great! Ordered the blue & coral too! 😍 the yellow is gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Tay

customer_reviews.title: They sound like pair of earphones you can get at the dollar store.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I am extremely disappointed. The sound quality is awful. The Apple earphones that came with my phone sound much better. Don’t bother getting this product. The material quality is great but other than that I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are great. They have great sound quality and bass. They came with many size ear tips that will fit a lot of people. The lighting connection works great. Very helpful especially when you don’t want to use an adapter
customer_reviews.author: Bpinson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Trash.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price tag. Apple's inbox EarPods are better. No bass, take my word for it. It's better to buy the Studio if u want a good Beats or buy a cheaper brand which sounds just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Jam2WhatabiutTee

customer_reviews.title: I love Beats
customer_reviews.text: I've owned the powerbeats 3 and now these urbeats3 and as Ive expected, they work like a charm. The sound quality is very nice, not too high on the bass and are very clear. Taking calls with them is easy and so far they seem durable and I think they will last a long.
customer_reviews.author: BJ1517

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty bad earphones. If you don’t get a good seal in your ears they sound like garbage. The problem with that is that if they move at all, you lose the seal, and they move a lot. Who thought a flat cord was a good idea? It kinks, twists, and is too stiff for earphones sensitive to movement. I gave these a few weeks of use and I would recommend just using the standard Apple earphones. Hey Beats, try making some foam ear pieces like Shure. They mold to your ear and you don’t lose the seal when you move.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Christmas

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like these...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Unique design that prevents tangling. Volume adjustment is functional. Cons: Not sure why, but earbuds started to irritate inside my ear. Never had this experience with any earbuds. Sound quality honestly sounds a bit worse compared to cheaper earphones from less popular brands I've previously bought. No case. Conclusion: My honest opinion, not worth the money. Worth at most $20. Better options out there!
customer_reviews.author: ReptCrazed

customer_reviews.title: Stops functioning properly after one month
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound quality overall, however the earbuds constantly fall out of my ears, despite changing the sizing. I've also only had the headphones for about a month and a half and they're already crapping out on me. I bump my phone and the music will stop playing so I have to unplug and replug the headphones back in to get them to work. This never happens when I use my apple headphones instead. I take good care of these headphones so there's no possible way I could've damaged them after only having them for over a month. I can't even return these crappy headphones so I'm very disappointed in the money I spent.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Warning:it is very loud😂
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this product, the bass the sound, and it fits wherever i put it, the packaging was amazing it made me feel like i really spent good money on a product, overall the quality of these earbuds are amazing and i would recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Yesss mammmmmmm

customer_reviews.title: Worst head phones I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Not a bot, honest review. By far the worst product I've ever had. The biggest complaint is that you can hear the vibrations every time the cords move. The sound quality is WAY worse than the Apple out of the box pair. There is also no noise cancelation unless you jam them into your ear to the point where it feels like your ears are completely clogged. I would have returned them if I hadn't taken them on a trip and had to use them for a week. DO NOT BUY....
customer_reviews.author: janson Wigo

customer_reviews.title: Just Buy Them. Don’t listen to loser amazon critics that prob go to community college still.
customer_reviews.text: Anyone disliking these headphones just trying to get attention on the internet for no reason. These headphones are excellent my boi. Of course they gonna fall out sometimes bro, they are wired, idiot. But listening to rap and just mainstream music with even average bass sounds just N A S T Y. In a good way... I forgot how sick good bass feels coming from my AirPods. Also, the sound is just very immersive and isolating almost. Just god tier honestly. I literally have them in my ear as we speak. Go ahead and add them to your cart and thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: Ur Boi. No BS

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for a month and so far my favorite corded headphones. They attach to iPhone 7 without adapter. I use more for work and phone calls and never have an issue with clarity. Have worked out a couple times when I forgot Bluetooth and no issues. They do not tangle as much as some other brands I’ve used. As for noise cancelling, not quite as good as the true ear muff style but great for ear buds. Hopefully they continue to work this well!
customer_reviews.author: Deucedollar24

customer_reviews.title: Noisy every time I move my head
customer_reviews.text: Really dislike these wired headphones. I mostly listen to podcasts and quieter music as background noise for working in an office, and boy do I hear every single movement of my head as I just simply exist and work. When the wires touch anything, they make noise that reverberates up the headphones into your ears. I bought these due to the Apple lightning connector but I really wish I hadn't. Totally overpriced. I have wireless Jaybirds for working out that are 10/10 but I didn't want to have to charge something all the time for sitting at my desk. Wish I hadn't gotten these, awful.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hope

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Wish there was a case that came along with it but other than that great for my iPhone XR hands free in the car or for watching shows
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing earbuds with a caveat
customer_reviews.text: They don't work properly with non-iPhone phones. I didn't realize this before I bought them. The volume controls apparently only work on iPhones. You can still use the play/pause button, but it would be nice to have full functionality. As far as sound goes though, they sound amazing. Great, powerful bass. They also have some pretty decent noise cancellation due to their snug fit. And at only $50 these are a good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Eric W

customer_reviews.title: Really terrible sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are really terrible. I just wanted red earphones, and I'd be willing to trade some sound quality just So I can have red earphones... but these are just really bad. I thought it was the new MP3 player I bought, but I switched to my Razer headphones right after using these and... Nope. It's the headphones. All the one star reviews about these earphone being worse than stock apple earphones is TRUE. For a set of 50 earphones I would at least expect these to be somewhat decent...
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Dollar store quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these have very poor sound quality. Like others have already stated, these are about on par with headphones you could find on the dollar rack at a gas station. The cord feels easily breakable, flimsy, and causes excessive noise transmission into the earbud if it rubs against anything at all. The controls dont seem to function for android and the earbuds also fall out for no reason at all. I own Beats studio headphones and they are awesome.... I am really disappointed with the lack of quality on this product. These will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic earphones for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I just replaced my first pair of urbeats with these earphones. The sound on this new pair is absolutely incredible. The noise cancelling is amazing. I’m getting the same quality as I do with my $350 pair of Bose headphones. Can’t say enough positive. I do wish the piece used for volume control was made of metal rather than plastic. It was this part that broke on my first pair of urbeats. It seems flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Madcitygirl

customer_reviews.title: Does What is Advertised: Good
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I bought these is because AirPods do not fit in my ear or does Apple Headphones and I do not have a headphone jack on my phone. This is a very good Lightning Headphones with a good amount of Bass for iPhone 7, 7+, 8,8+,10,10s,10s Max, 10R. They come with multiple ear tips and wings for a good fit in your ear, and that is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Noushat Hossain

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and built quality but earphone design sucks, doesn’t stay in ear.
customer_reviews.text: These earphones are a big disappointment only because they don’t fit my ears and always fall out by any slight wire movement. Yes I tried all size rubber fittings they come with and they’re all terrible. The largest rubber fittings keeps them secure but it hurts wearing them because it acts like a suction cup on my eardrums. I never had a problem with Apple’s earphones, much superior design and never fell out of my ears, but Apple’s were terrible because of cheap wires that broke every 6 month to a year.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID V.

customer_reviews.title: Buy Belkin for half the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking they were like my first pair of Beats. These have a tin sound with little or no bass. Also they don’t have the typical Beats case. Saw what looked like the exact pair made by Belkin for sale for half the price. I do like the magnets in the buds. They make it easier to keep together.
customer_reviews.author: Charleston girl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I know it's "old school" to use wired headsets, but I really love knowing that my headset battery isn't going to shut off in the middle of a nightly meditation. I use these as well as the Beats wireless products and love all of them for their sound quality. Especially recommend these corded ones. Clear, crisp sound. Not a lot of bass, so that's important for those of you who are used to heavy bass from products like Bose. These are not like Bose in that the sound is not as booming, if that's helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer V

customer_reviews.title: These earphone from beats need to much love because they are good product
customer_reviews.text: Beat lightning wired earphones on the market. The bass is loud, the volume is LOUD. I could drown out outside noise with an ease. These earphone from beats need to much love because they are good product. I was trying to buy these at Best Buy and other retailers, but everyone in my area was sold out. I knew from there, these earphone was gonna be a beast. They didn’t disappoint. I advise everyone who like bass and loud volume to buy URBeats 3 dam it!!!!!!!!!!! 👌🏼👏🏻😁🤨🤩🤬
customer_reviews.author: Brandon freeman

customer_reviews.title: a necessity for working from home
customer_reviews.text: I dont like headphones that go over my ears because it presses down on my earrings. These headphones have gummy-like tips that fit comfortably in your ear. I love beats and i love that they are magnetic so they attach together when your not using them. I also have these in the bluetooth version as well, but I needed an aux cable one for my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Mc

customer_reviews.title: They won’t stay in my ears
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what the hype is in these. First off they won’t stay in my ears. No matter the size pad I use the my fall out, even if I’m sitting and slightly move my head. Never before with any ear buds have I had this problem. I went back to my good old Apple ear buds. Sorry Beats I’m not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L

customer_reviews.title: Use an equalizer!
customer_reviews.text: They're largely the same as urbeats 1 and 2 and has noticeable stronger mid section sound which I was not expecting since my experience with beats has been all bass and treble. For best results use an equalizer (why wouldn't you to begin with) and build quality feels improved over older styles of urbeats. L and R are not labeled from what I can tell but the side with the controls is left like previous models. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto XS

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but maybe not for working out
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to purchase these but after I saw a sale I went on and I’m glad I did. The sound quality is perfect I can hear a clear difference in these headphones than others. At first they wouldn’t fit in my ear but I looked in the box and saw smaller sizes which now work perfectly. If you want these to work out I’m not sure how great these will be as the fit does slide out the ear with movement but for just the pleasure of listening to music I Def would recommend especially if it’s still a great sale
customer_reviews.author: Precious Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Can’t believe it’s Beats!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price (got them on sale) and quality I was shocked they were beats! Was expecting a knockoff but they’re the real deal guys. Additionally since I have an iPhone with no aux input I’m glad they sold it compatible with the lightning cable alternative since the regular Apple headphones don’t work for my small ears (they constantly slide out no matter how tightly and painfully I try to jam them in there).
customer_reviews.author: Xenobia

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones just Be Careful with them
customer_reviews.text: These are great earbuds, best I’ve used, except... they’re almost disposable. My first pair had the sound quit on the right side on the right ear, when I paused Hulu with the remote. My second pair bent where the cable enters the lightning jack after they got tangled in a desk chair and I dropped my phone trying to untangle them. But, they’re also a great product, they have better sound quality than even my Skull Candy earbuds for my iPad 6th gen. They truly are tangle free because of the magnets that are on the back of the earbuds where the beats logo is. I love these earbuds and I will be replacing them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey C.

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds keep falling out Sound quality is good
customer_reviews.text: I orignally purchased this one for daily using while commute. The sound quality is pretty good as expected, but the earbuds have been falling out of my ears way too often. I have tried all different size to find the good fit, but they haven't very well on me. I even tried push little harder to avoid falling out, which is not comfortable, but it still falls out. It is very annoying for me to keep some position to avoid the earbuds falling out while driving. There are some other reviews mentioning this issue as well. If I read those one, probably won't purchase this one. Definately got to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Huang

customer_reviews.title: Horrible sound, no bass at all
customer_reviews.text: If you like horrible sound and don’t care about rubbish lower and higher frequenzies, these are the onces for you (but there are probably $5 alternatives that are better). If you like good quality sound, find something else! I didn’t do proper research and assumed there was a link between these and beats by dr dre.. There isn’t.. Even tried to use high quality soft plugs that normally boosts up the bass, but since the sound quality is so terrible and there is no bass at all, even this didn’t help. Conclusion; Whoever signed these out and approved them.. Find something else to do! Unfortunatly I didn’t try them out until the return window was closed..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my first pair and one of the ear buds didn’t work, so I got a replacement, which was easy to return, they sent me my new ones right away, and I waited to return the broken ones till I received the new ones. But so far so good, I like the changeable bud sizes. The ones that come on them are too big for my ears. The sound is good, cancels out much of the background noises/people while I’m at work. So I would definitely buy again and recommend to anyone who wants to listen to their podcasts and not people sit and talk about themselves all day ;)
customer_reviews.author: Daniele

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for our daughter's new iPhone. She has used many different brand's of headphones and said these are by far the best and her favorite's. I'll take that as a 5 star review any day!!! They match her yellow iPhone perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: BJMC

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$!
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical about ordering these after reading reviews. Glad I did! I purchased these as a replacement for my other pair which cost 3 times as much from Best Buy. Unfortunately I was just out of my warranty when they stopped working. Anyway, this product works just as great! I only had to buy the ear wing separately as these didn't come with it. Only costs a few bucks. WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.author: Noely01

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place, fantastic sound
customer_reviews.text: In this time of COVID I really needed a great set of headphones. I wear these for 4-5 hours at a time, really almost in the entire day and night in at least 1 ear. These stay in place and nobody has complained about my audio quality. Update: as of 2 months later, all of the sudden the sound is cutting out, but comes back when the headset is jiggled. return period is closed but just watch out (or buy the coverage to extend the period). I had thought these would last longer than a few months for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great warranty service from Apple
customer_reviews.text: I love these, however, my right earbud died after just 3 months. Luckily, they are still under warranty. Working with Apple on repair/replacement. Their customer service has been great. Sadly, I have to mail them back before repair/replacement, sonI will be without my headphones for work for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Salyer

customer_reviews.title: DIED IN 4 MOUNTHS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I went back to Beats instead of buying cheap headphones again and I did love them and only use them in my office for work, so there has been no damage, and there is no major stress of working out, using them 24/7! Today 4 months after purchase, probably regularly using them for 6-8 weeks. They just died, no warning, no reason and its too late to return them so i am basically out $60 bucks! Or hours of my life trying to figure out who to call for help etc. Highly disappointed :-(
customer_reviews.author: Patricia waters

customer_reviews.title: Don't stay in; broke after 4 weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds don't stay in and didn't come with wing tips as I had expected they would. The left one completely stopped working after 4 weeks of use - no damage whatsoever to the wire or connector and tried it in 3 different devices. Spoke to both Amazon rep and Apple customer service supervisor for over 40 minutes, they refused to replace them. They would have to send the earbuds off for repair, but cannot make any promises. This is unacceptable customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Sakura

customer_reviews.title: They could be much better.
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds sound extremely clear, but the problem is that on the highest level you will hear alot of distortion on the sound and will even hurt your ear that much volume, another thing bad about these earbuds is the quality of the cable, the cable looks very thin in comparison with the old version of these I had the urbeats 3 with 3.5 mm jack and they have a stronger cable it's thicker in comparison with these and these fall from your ear very easily, so with that thin cable you can also tell that they won't last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: All in all, these headphones are mediocre. I appreciate that Beats has lowered their prices over the years, however compared to apple headphones, these headphones lose because they do not feel as comfortable and the wires tend to make noise when I move unlike the apple headphones. These headphones were not horrific, but for $50 I have to say ehhhh not that impressed.
customer_reviews.author: BigWill

customer_reviews.title: Low sound quality, bad ear design.
customer_reviews.text: These are really not very good. The sound feels like it's far away, clarity is average at best, and you can hear the cords swinging under the earbuds. They earpieces also don't fit well. I'm using the small ones and they still pop out of my ears unless I jam them in there with a full vacuum effect in my ear canal, and even THEN one of them likes to still pop out.
customer_reviews.author: MMB

customer_reviews.title: Line noise!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit in my ears, LINE NOISE, LINE NOISE, LINE NOISE! How can you make a good quality earbud and cheapen out on the wires. If something brushes up against the wires, you hear it like a hammer striking stone. I get that type of quality with my $7 headphones. Would not buy again. Sucks that the only way you find out is to buy them to try them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Lewis

customer_reviews.title: They do not work the other person on the phone line cannot hear you
customer_reviews.text: These do not work at all when calling someone. You can hear music in them and you can hear the other person speak but the other person can’t hear you on their end!! Just got them went to an appointment try to use them in the car try to use them outside I tried to use inside the office nothing no one could ever hear me when the headphones were plugged into the phone. Complete waste of money so returning ASAP!!
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: great mic for cycling/wind noise
customer_reviews.text: I have had a nightmare trying to find a set that is useable when cycling. I have literally tried 20 different types in ear, wireless, bone conduction, etc and still haven't found one that matches the noise reduction, sound quality or the mic quality while riding. These are the ONLY ones I've tried that people can hear me talk while riding or running with a wind.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN F. CAMP

customer_reviews.title: Iphone earphones wins over beats.. bummer
customer_reviews.text: I was realllllllly hoping i would fall in love with this earphone. The vocals/speech part is clear BUT bass is faint. Music sound is not crisp. I tried adjusting the equalizer on my iphone Sound settings but theres not difference even with the treble or bass booster. The original iphone earphones give out a better sound. No noise cancellation on this one just incase some of you are wondering
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlady

customer_reviews.title: ZERO base response
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Beats product that I've bought and it will be my last. I cannot stress enough how bad, quite literally absent, bass response these ear buds have. These are so tinny. I'm using spotify, base boost, have messed w/ the equilizer etc. etc. Absolutely terrible bass response. Don't bother. I'm hoping I got a pair of duds, as I simply cannot believe all of the glowing reviews for this product.
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, especially with bass-heavy music. Feels super comfortable in-ear, and noise cancels decently. Color also matches image. My last pair lasted a year with rough use/a trip through the washer and dryer. I'm sure these will last way longer with gentler care. Play/pause button and mic works with my Samsung Galaxy s6 but the volume up/down buttons don't, which really isn't a big deal to me, but just stating it for anyone who may prioritize the feature. Several people have told me they can hear me better with this mic vs. other earbuds' mics and even the phone's regular mic. Overall great product and will be my go-to earbuds if/when this pair needs replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: These aren’t that great.
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable in your ears, but for the price I feel like my $15 Sony earbuds produced better quality sound. Not super impressed with these at all. The bass quality sounds like a speaker that is about to blow out and the audio is not very loud, even with the volume up. They cancel noise better than my Sony’s, but I can still hear people talking around me. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sets (1 for me, 1 for my husband). We each have different hearing levels and needs. Neither of us got a good sound from these. it was frustrating felt I could have gotten the same result from the airplane free set. They kept falling out (tried different covers), tried shoving in further which altered the sound. I was hoping for something better but didn't want to spend a fortune and don't like the extra large over the head type. I read the lengthy review about warming up, and all the issues there. Not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Decent earbuds
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds do the job. I’m not a connoisseur of earbuds but they work fine. My only problem is that they continuously fall out of my ears. I have a smaller ear opening, so I switched up the tips with the pack that came with it, thinking they were too big. However, that didn’t stop the issue. I’ve learned to deal with it, but it’s annoying.
customer_reviews.author: jwild

customer_reviews.title: Pure Junk
customer_reviews.text: Not what I would have expected from this company. Sound is horrible, wear is uncomfortable, and they do not stay in your ears if you move. They would never be used during exercise. I've had cheap earbuds that were 100% better.
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: bad fit for my ears, cord sucks
customer_reviews.text: all four sets of tips don’t work for one of my ears. i can’t even get these things to stay in my ears while i’m sitting down, much less during any kind of activity. the cord is weirdly heavy and short and catches on things easily because of the grippy texture, pulling the earphone out of my ear on a dime. horrendous waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: vanguard

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound but not super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good. Better than cheap earbuds. The noise canceling is pretty good I’m very careful with my earbuds. Wired or wireless. The area near the plug became weakened after about a month and the rubber covering the wires wore thin. I used shrink wire covering to keep it from wearing All the way through.
customer_reviews.author: CostumeDramaQueen

customer_reviews.title: Most Anything Sounds Better Than This
customer_reviews.text: Awful sound. Very flat. Any $5 earbud sounds better than this. Even the white Apple earbuds that come with the iPhone sound better than these. And the Apple earbuds are terrible. I have many Beats products and they all sound really good. What happened Apple? It's a shame Apple has pushed Beats to the side and are not even trying to create a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Stevo

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These are the same beats I had but with the correct connection for the iPhone I love these beats nice and simple last a long time if you take care of your stuff I’m replacing the old pair after over a year of use I accidentally broke the cable while on a walk so user error I hope these last as long I use them at least four hours a day
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Typical Authentic Beats Quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome earbuds. They were delivered in a sealed package in new condition. I purchased the gold pair with the lightning type connector. My only complaint is the color. They are a light tan color with no gold in them whatsoever. The magnetic surface where they stick together is the only gold you will find on the buds. Other than that, definitely beige. The case and extras (ear hooks and replacement buds) are a nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: Terry107

customer_reviews.title: Serious differences with the new model.
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these for years and the sound was better, the small size earbuds were much smaller. I'm not sure about keeping them because the quality just isn't there. It's so hard to find earbuds that don't hurt my ears and I'm so, so sad these aren't it anymore. They aren't terrible, just big and the sound quality is much less.
customer_reviews.author: Jessnarch

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money spent
customer_reviews.text: I've had another set of Beats for almost 8 years that are still kicking strong! But I needed another pair that I didn't have to use the apple adapter with, I was amazed to find that beats had a set! I love these headphones, beats are probably the only set of headphones I'll ever buy. The sound quality is above par. Overall I am very happy with this new set. I paid $120.00 8 years ago for my first set so the price on these was a great surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, quality, and value!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality , Treble thru Bass ranges good! Love the flat, non-tangling cord and control bar/button right there ! 4 choices of ear- buds to fit just right ! Excellent value .. I am a musician with lots of experience in stage sound equipment!! I also have a bad right ear and these ear buds provide good sound and quality !
customer_reviews.author: Margaret O'neil

customer_reviews.title: Sketchy audio
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have a strange audio consistency. At times its sounds like audio straight out of a studio, other times it sound like you have a fish bowl over your head. Audio will sound super compressed and for the asking price this issue shouldn't happen. Getting a replacement doesn't solve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Nice beats, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Actually pretty decent ear buds. Add a DAC, & the sound quality ranks right up there with a product costing 3-4 times as much. As an IPhone 11 user, I love the fact I can just connect using the lightening connection. I have 2 pairs that I got on sale for $37.99(ea). I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend a pair, especially if you see them at that price.
customer_reviews.author: Dru

customer_reviews.title: All around these are the best earbuds I’ve had for the money hands down.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t really complain about anything for the price point! And on a motorcycle at a prolonged 100mph on the highway they stay in my ears with no hooks or anything! I was surprised! The ONLY grip I might have is that the highs aren’t as good as they might be in a more expensive pair of earbuds but you really won’t notice much.
customer_reviews.author: Graves

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Once I get the volume up halfway or past on my iPhone, outside noise is cancelled. I’m hearing things in my music that I never heard using the lightning cable Apple headphones. Sometimes though on calls they act weird... so I just flip the lighting cable over. Not sure if there’s a specific side that’s supposed to go in. Other than that small thing ~ these headphones are great.
customer_reviews.author: Wealtherly

customer_reviews.title: Apple earphones are much better
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a bit of an upgrade to my standard issue Apple earphones (EarPods), but was disappointed with the sound quality (compared to EarPods). The sound clarity is good, don't get me wrong, but the depth doesn't even compare to the EarPods. Listening to multiple songs, going back and forth between the Urbeats3 and the standard EarPods, I can easily hear a stronger depth of tone from the EarPods. For sound quality and price, the EarPods are superior.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Keeps falling out my ears.
customer_reviews.text: The ear bud falls out. You literally have to push it in all the way and it feels extremely uncomfortable when you talk. Like plugging both ears up and talking. I can hear my own voice in my head reverberating. However the biggest problem is the headset doesn’t stay inside the ears. It falls out. Annoying. Even with different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Narine

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I use earbuds daily at work doing construction, these are my fourth pair in about two years. So far I haven’t found a pair that can last more than a few months, I had high hopes for these but the left side went out recently. They seem sturdy but everything is Chinese garbage it seems. I may try dewalt next and see how those work out.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Larson

customer_reviews.title: THEY DONT SAY THEY COME WITH A CASE, There Perfect for me n I know headphones 🎧
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these for my Apple XR, I have AirPods but wanted cord ones n these are PERFECT, (NO THEY DO NOT COME WITH A CASE & DO NOT SAY THEY DO) I’ve read comments on that n a case Is not a biggie to me 🤷🏻‍♀️ & NO WHERE Is one offered, (comes In box, headphones, 3 extra sizes for ears ( If needed) booklet) 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: PinkboutIt

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a month
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for use with a new iPhone. After less than a month (but after enough time that the return window has passed) they're trash. They will work for 3-4 minutes at a time, and then randomly stop. I'm very disappointed-- I've bought $5 headphones at the drugstore that lasted longer than this.
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth

customer_reviews.title: Nearly Indestructible and Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my brother for Christmas. They have been left in pockets and gone through the wash multiple times and the dryer a few as well. Hold up like champions. Only recently has a tiny chip appeared near the jack, but it has not affected sound quality at all, and they continue to remain the best earbuds a person could have.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I received these April 19. They were ok but they fall out of your ear easily and I noticed today there is a crack in the wire... my window for return was May 31 Which was 4 days ago... I do not suggest ordering these as they are not worth the money... I will order a dongle and get a decent pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: They give four different ear pieces and none of them stay in my ears. They are really bad like cheap corner store headphones. I got these as a birthday gift in June. They are horrible. If I could return them I would. Don’t waste your money on these. I had to buy myself the Apple headphones
customer_reviews.author: CJH

customer_reviews.title: There are better options for earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: You can do better than these earbuds. The sound is similar to other earbuds that are more reasonably priced for a product that will break like every other option on the market. Like most apple products this one failed shortly after its warranty expired. The warranty is 1 year, the microphone and control button failed 1 year and 2 months after I purchased them. Disappointed to say the least, I imagine the full sized headsets are better but don’t think I’ll risk the cost v quality/fashionability.
customer_reviews.author: JR K.

customer_reviews.title: Headphones break and these were no exception
customer_reviews.text: Because headphones break, the less you spend per pair, the better off you’ll be. I bought two pears , and only one pair still works. I prefer my Sony WI-C310 pair to beats x. These kept falling out of my ear, the battery was unspectacular, they broke, and the my would lose my phone’s signal when my phone was in my pocket. Can’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A Nonny Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. IMO they sound better than Airpods Pro. Only downside is the cord. But if I’m stationary at the computer or in a chair, that’s irrelevant. They have good bass and full sound. Good for podcasts and music and YouTube. They’re kind of expensive, but I think they’re worth it.
customer_reviews.author: J.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item as a gift. It arrived on time and was exactly as described. We haven’t heard anything negative from the recipient, therefore you get 5 stars from us. In the unlikely event we hear anything out of the ordinary. We will update our posts as necessary.
customer_reviews.author: BROBB

customer_reviews.title: Not Original
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when they first came out and loved them. I decided to buy the same exact one again since I had lost my previous ones. I’m not sure if these are knock offs or refurbished because their definitely not the same. They’re missing the wingtip earbuds and the case my original beats brought. The mic is also 3 inch away from your mouth yet my voice goes in and out constantly. To make any type of call I have to place the mic practically on my mouth and that’s extremely frustrating considering Beats headphones aren’t cheap. On the other their sound quality is just as great.
customer_reviews.author: Jahaira Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Cheap Sounding
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of pairs of wired earbuds after losing my Bose Soundsports while traveling. I got the Sony Extra Bass buds ($29.99 on promotion currently) and these for $59.99. I expected the Sony's to be of lower quality while the Beats would be nice for $60. I was very mistaken. Compared to the Sony's, these sounded like OG Apple buds for an Ipod. These sound very tinny, with no fullness at all to the sound. I was very disappointed and I love my original over-ear Beats still. Neither the Sony's nor these obviously compare to the Bose Soundsport but you also pay for the privilege with Bose. Highly disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They feel different than the beats x. Material is a little rougher but I like the sound quality of plug in headphones vs wireless. Bought while on sale so definitely worth it. Not a lot of lightning earbuds out there so these are my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great quality, great look
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are sturdy, functional, and beautiful. Due to the awesome cord quality, these earbuds never tangle. Also the magnetic earbud feature is pretty cool! It's 100% compatible with Apple products. Volume quality is 10/10. It has volume buttons, a button to pause/play/skip music and answer calls, and a mic. What I love the most is the changeable earbuds. The earbuds come with a set attached and then in the box there are 3 different options ranging in size. You also get a 1 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Kenya Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Urbeats3 Wired Earphones With Lightning Connector -
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these based on the reviews and beacuse Beats is such a great product. These wired earphones were junk. The cord was thick and not very flexible but most importantly they would not stay in my ears, even trying each set of the various sizes for the ears. I have used numerous earphones and have not had any issues. Extremely dissappointing. I would even contemplate they were not really made by Beats, but perhaps a knock off.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable and not worthy
customer_reviews.text: They sort of heavy and uncomfortable, I am not sure why exactly but I don’t like how they feel. I can feel them pulling me down. All other earphones didn’t give me that weird pulling down feeling. I keep in readjusting the cable;
customer_reviews.author: agata scibich

customer_reviews.title: Slightly expensive, but totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some wired (not Bluetooth) earbuds and couldn't be happier with the Urbeats3 Wired Earphones. They fit comfortably in my ears and the tangle-free cord is great. The microphone works with my MacBook Pro, which strangely has been an issue with other wired earbuds. The only thing that would make them better would be a slightly longer cord length. I would highly recommend these to anyone willing to spend the extra for a quality pair of earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hanley

customer_reviews.title: just like all the rest
customer_reviews.text: every lightning cable attachment cannot maintain connection while in pocket. thought these ear buds would be different. but no, same dif. they pop on and off while just sitting in the pocket. every step you take. going to have to get an ipod for my music and podcasts. there is no lighting attachment that will work for headphones. no way anyone is using that arm band for jogging.
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: Love these earphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They don't tangle, they sound great and they also work great for phone calls. I prefer the earbuds over the apple type because they are more comfortable. This was my 2nd pair as I accidentally broke my last ones. I was hesitant to buy refurbished but they have worked out great!.
customer_reviews.author: Solaurie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it - go wireless
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to have these just in case my wireless headphones died, but I should have just bought a back up pair of the wireless ones. These headphones are constantly distorting the sound and I'm constantly having to wiggle the cord trying to rectify it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ack

customer_reviews.title: It’s a bit pricy, but well worth the payment.
customer_reviews.text: OBSESSED WITH THESE ..I wish it would’ve came with the “fins” ( fins to anchor the buds in your ears. You can opt to use the fins or not, but if you're doing anything active, like running, you'll want to use them; they work well and fit comfortably. ) ...just like the BeatsX, I love those fins cause it truly helps keep secure the in-ear inside the ear and won’t fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Though I have the Beats Solo 3, and think its great. I was hoping for the same with these. Nope. These will simply not stay put in your ear. Even the slightest movement of your head will pop out. The sound quality isn’t that great either. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: I. Farooq

customer_reviews.title: Hollow sound, no bass
customer_reviews.text: Sound is remarkably bad. The bass and depth of sound is better on the headphones that came with my iPhone. I’ve been using Bose headphones for years but they don’t make one with a lightning connector so thought I’d try beats. Thumbs down
customer_reviews.author: vanValkyrie

customer_reviews.title: Second Pair - Love Them
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble sleeping so listen to audio books to fall asleep. I have gone through several pair of head phones until I found these. The urBeats earphones are sturdy and the first pair lasted a couple years of every night use. Hope they’re still available when I need another pair. I wear them loosely, so I can’t discuss noise reduction. Also don’t work out in them.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Love Them, Ordering Another!
customer_reviews.text: I love the cool colors, sounds quality, plug n play and magnets that keep the eat buds together when not in use. The only way these could be better is with a case. Luckily I have lots of cases laying around. Gonna order the coral ones.
customer_reviews.author: SheLuvsGodTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Beats — sadly it’s all hype now
customer_reviews.text: These have the sound of $1.99 drugstore earbuds. I thought I was treating myself to something special — they are terrible. Tinny. No bass. Going right back to amazon.
customer_reviews.author: audrey d

customer_reviews.title: Beats that drop
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds tend to fall out of ears more often than expected. The magnetic backs are nice to snap together to link behind neck when not in use. The sound is best when you anchor earbuds deep into ears (best low end) otherwise they will be thin sounding and likely to slip out.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Karvonen

customer_reviews.title: Meh... just ok➰
customer_reviews.text: There are two things I don’t like about these... 1. The mic is on the left ear so when you’re driving it’s close to the window. 2. The ear piece wires connect way too high, it feels like it’s chucking my neck.
customer_reviews.author: 5ive Cents

product_meta.title: urBeats Wired Earphones With Lightning Connector - Tangle Free Cable, Magnetic Earbuds, Built In Mic And Controls - Blue
feature_bullets: High performance wired earbuds in blue
Fine-tuned acoustic design delivers an exceptional listening experience
Compatible with iOS and Android products
Optimal ergonomic design for all-day comfort
Variety of Ear tip options provide individualized fit for noise isolation
